more.requirement: At least one years experience as bar staff serving non alcoholic as well as alcoholic beverages to guests. Barista training well regarded. Honesty, enthusiasm, willingness to learn, reliable team member, not afraid of long hours and hard work, happy smiling face, good health, ability to speak and write English an advantage
more.description: Bartender is to sell and serve non-alcoholic and alcoholic beverages to customers and to maintain a clean, orderly and well-stocked bar. Ensure compliance with legal requirements. *Deliver excellent customer service, at all times *Serve and present beverages, quickly and efficiently, meeting our standards *Assist in keeping the bar and front-of-house clean and tidy at all times
more.benefit: * Our staff work an 8-hour roster, which may include split shifts, 6 days per week. * In addition to salary and split shift payments our staff may receive tips and bonuses * 12 days paid holidays per year after 12 months * Staff meals, bike parking and other benefits * Great training program to help you develop the professional skills for a long term career
